scripts.build:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn codegen && graph build subgraphs/subgraph.yaml
scripts.build:bsc: yarn prepare:bsc && yarn codegen && graph build subgraphs/subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache subgraphs/config/mainnet.json src/constants/constants.mustache > src/constants/constant.ts && mustache subgraphs/config/mainnet.json subgraphs/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraphs/subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:bsc: mustache subgraphs/config/bsc.json src/constants/constants.mustache > src/constants/constant.ts && mustache subgraphs/config/bsc.json subgraphs/subgraph.template.yaml > subgraphs/subgraph.yaml
scripts.nuke: sudo rm -r tests/.bin/ && rm -r generated && rm -r subgraphs/subgraph.yaml
